member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.Extensions
member.summary: This class contains the LINQ to XML extension methods that enable you to evaluate XPath expressions.

member.param: An that can process XPath queries.
member.returns: An that can process XPath queries.

member.summary: Creates an for an . The enables more efficient XPath expression processing.
member.param: An that can process an XPath query.
member.returns: An that can process XPath queries.

A that contains an XPath expression.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XPath.Extensions.XPathEvaluate(System.Xml.Linq.XNode,System.String,System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver)
member.summary: Evaluates an XPath expression, resolving namespace prefixes using the specified .

A that contains an XPath expression.
A for the namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.
member.returns: An object that contains the result of evaluating the expression. The object can be a bool, a double, a string, or an .
